mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO , USER_NAME , USER_EMAIL , SUBSTR(USER_PASSWD,1,1) || LPAD('*',length(USER_PASSWD)-2,'*') || SUBSTR(USER_PASSWD, length(USER_PASSWD), 1) AS USER_PASSWD , TO_CHAR(REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM FROM TB_SAMPLE ORDER BY USER_NO
SELECT USER_NO , USER_NAME , USER_EMAIL , USER_PASSWD , TO_CHAR(REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM FROM TB_SAMPLE WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no}
